meta.job_title: Vice President, Enterprise Applications & Health IT

duties_responsibilities.duty: Supervise and manage the enterprise application team, partnering with program staff to plan and implement projects as needed by departments.
Identify and prioritize emergent technology needs, lead software requirements elicitation and documentation processes, and propose solutions for technology needs.
Coordinate with vendors for enterprise applications and remain current on product developments for enterprise applications.

Manage IT projects as assigned by the CIO, including developing project plans, monitoring project progress, and overseeing development and delivery of online reference materials and end-user trainings.
Communicate with staff on proactive basis regarding IT changes and incidents that affect them, and enforce information technology policies.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's degree in IT, Computer Science, or a related field (Master's preferred)
Extensive experience in using and managing electronic health record systems
